title: Anna Nadai Lyrics Thagararu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Anna Nadai
Singer(s):  Velmurugan, Chinna Ponnu
Music: Dharan Kumar
Movie: Thagararu

Ye anna nadai, azhagu nadai
asathuraadaa aapa kadai
Chinna idai, minnum udai
iva angamellaam thanga kadai

Ye anna nadai, azhagu nadai
asathuraadaa aapa kadai
Chinna idai, minnum udai
iva angamellaam thanga kadai

ye anna anna anna anna nadai azhagu nadai
asathuraadaa aapa kadai
Chinna idai, minnum udai
iva angamellaam thanga kadai

thooongaadha ooru madhura da
naan pokkaadha thanga kudhirada
ada paakaadha aalu illada
enna thorandhupaaru manasu vella da (Ye anna nadai..)

Ye velavetti illaama summaathaana suthurom
un azhaga paathuputtu moolakettu nikkurom
unga ammaa ennaku atha
unnaku ezhudhi vaikuren en sotha
eduthuvacha roopaa nota
adi enga vandhu naanum kutha ..

Aathu thanni pola naanada
ena azhuku vara alli kudida
sandhanathil senja ponnuda
unaku saarayam weaku kannuda (Ye anna nadai..)

Ye ribbonula lovenga thachikitta unnaku
pogudhadi nenjuvali ennaku
ne annaipatti meen kuzhambu
adi amsavalli biriyaani
rani villaa saapaadu
adi senjirukken erppaadu

ye genda meenu kanna paathuta
ada pombalaikum aasa vaum da
ye kirangadikkum kaala paathuta
sethavanum yendhiripaanda     (Ye anna nadai..)

thooongaadha ooru madhura da
naan pokkaadha thanga kudhirada
ada paakaadha aalu illada
enna thorandhupaaru manasu vella da
